summary: Results-driven engineer with 4 years of research experience in Canada, specializing in electrochemical energy conversion systems for transportation, with proven success in cross-sector project leadership, advanced testing, and data-driven innovation in low-carbon technologies.

skills.Electrochemical Systems: PEM Fuel Cells, PEM Water Electrolyzers, Li-ion Batteries
skills.Characterization Techniques: Potentiodynamic/Potentiostatic Polarization, EIS, LSV, CV, ICP-OES, SEM, EDX, TEM, XRD, XPS
skills.Prototyping & Instrumentation: Protective Coatings, MEA Fabrication, Fuel Cell Test Station, Potentiostat (Gamry), Goniometer, Four-point probe, Transient Plane Source
skills.Programming & ML: Python, MATLAB, Keras, TensorFlow, ANN, LSTM, XGB, Genetic Algorithm
skills.Modelling & Simulation: Siemens NX, Ansys Fluent, COMSOL, MATLAB, SOLIDWORKS
skills.Hardware & Embedded Systems: HDL for FPGA, VHDL, Intel Quartus, ModelSim

professionalExperience.jobTitle: Design and development of coated metallic bipolar plates for proton exchange membrane fuel cells
professionalExperience.companyName: Precision Resource, Cambridge, ON – University of Waterloo, ON
professionalExperience.productName: Nb-Ti Alloy/Pt Coated Metallic Bipolar Plates
projectDescription: Improved corrosion resistance of SS316L by 2.5× at 25 °C and 0.5× at 80 °C, achieving 99.98% protective efficiency, exceeding DOE targets.
Increased in-plane electrical conductivity by 42.6% and thermal conductivity by 3.5%, both surpassing DOE technical benchmarks.
Decreased interfacial contact resistance (ICR) by 2.5× under 140 N/cm2 compaction, supporting compact and high-performance stack design.
Enhanced hydrophobicity with larger surface contact angles, improving long-term water management and material stability.

Developed casual games using Unity engine, creating KIDSAFE gameplay experience with features like activities, in-app purchases, parental control, rewards system, ads, and secure-encrypted video playback.

Contributed to game play feature implementing state machine, internal game-wide event system, quest system, game mechanics and UI implementation, backend support maintaining large database running SQL server and .Net Core 6.
Delivered a dynamic content delivery system using Rest APIs and JSON, packaging and updating the contents of the app without to update the physical app binary with coverage of 90%.

Implemented optimisation techniques like object pooling, slicing, atlases, LODs, occlusions, and reducing GC usage by avoiding temporary allocations on every frame, string mutations and endorsing value types across application.

Crafted intricate run-time asset management system with asset bundles that dynamically updates the game elements reducing build size by 90% that are mapped by application version built for different mobile platforms.

Implemented multiple distributed systems such as network, asset management, backend CMS, users, profiles, inventory management, quest services that are decoupled and employing unit tests cases for all of them.

Developed an open world game and contributed to quests engine, NPC AI, microservices, economy, inventory management, runtime asset management, user session and optimizing render pipelines, memory, resulting in 45% performance gain.

Experienced with a full life cycle of software development- SDLC: use cases, requirements, high-level design, low-level design, implementation and writing unit test cases and avoiding concrete dependency using abstractions.

Developed SQL Server database project tailored for Book reservations, executing CRUD operations, designing reusable views, and orchestrating intricate queries, column-store indexing, stored procedures, and aggregate and scalar functions ensuring reusability of queries up to 80%.

Boosted the performance of the reservations system database by implementing indexing techniques and optimizing schema design with both clustered and non-clustered indexes, resulting in a remarkable 40% increase in efficiency, as evidenced by improved query execution times.

courseDescription: Mastering BI tools to create statistical analysis, data mining and predictive modelling to derive meaningful insights from the dataset by connecting to data source, preparing, aggregating, creating interactive dashboards, stories, and forecasting trends while maintaining security.

Upgrading database knowledge on MS-SQL Server by building database for e-commerce platform and optimising by indexing, normalizing for reducing redundancy, de-normalizing to reduce extra joins and tracking performance in query store resulting in performance gain of 35%.

Spearheaded capstone as Project Manager with 5 team members to understand and improve business architecture of RBC breaking down financial and business fundamentals by elicitation tools like observation, brainstorming, workshops potentially improving 15% in productivity.

Orchestrated proficiency in programming languages in Python, SQL to realize data warehouse (ETL) concepts like Data extraction, Transformation, Storage, Retrieval and Analysis, meta data management using data manipulation libraries like Pandas and NumPy.
Commenced with strong fundamentals of computer science like Object-Oriented Programming and Data structure algorithms.
